question: What is the main message conveyed by the Working Group I contribution to the Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change (IPCC) Sixth Assessment Report?
answer: The main message is that human activities have unequivocally heated the climate, and unless deep reductions in greenhouse gas emissions occur in the coming decades, global warming of 1.5°C and 2°C above pre-industrial levels will be exceeded during the 21st century.
